name: react-component-builder-toolkit
description: Quickly create React components with TypeScript

reactComponentBuilderToolkit.componentTe.markdownDescription: Template for the component file. Use `{ComponentName}` placeholder.

reactComponentBuilderToolkit.indexTempla.markdownDescription: Template for index file. Use `{ComponentName}` placeholder.

reactComponentBuilderToolkit.fileExtensi.markdownDescription: File extension for the generated component file.

reactComponentBuilderToolkit.createIndex.markdownDescription: Whether to create an index file alongside the component.

reactComponentBuilderToolkit.componentTe.markdownDescription: Absolute or workspace-relative path to a file whose contents will be used as the component template. If provided, this takes precedence over `componentTemplate`.

reactComponentBuilderToolkit.indexTempla.markdownDescription: Absolute or workspace-relative path to a file whose contents will be used as the index template. If provided, this takes precedence over `indexTemplate`.
